text: Appenzell Innerrhoden is one of the twenty-six cantons of Switzerland. It is the smallest canton by population and the second smallest by area. It is one of the only direct democracies in the world. == Districts == The 6 (districts) of Appenzell Innerrhoden are: *Appenzell, population 5587 (2002) *Gonten, population 1398 (2002) *Oberegg, population 1831 (2002) *Rüte, population 3036 (2002) *Schlatt-Haslen, population 1160 (2002) *Schwende, population 2094 (2002) == Other websites == *Official Page *Official Statistics *Säntis (German)
title: Appenzell Innerrhoden
